title: Squid Game: Unleashed is coming to Chromebook.
description: We're bringing the award-winning Squid Game: Unleashed game to your Chromebook and large screen Android devices like tablets and foldables.Developed by Boss Fight, Netfl…
excerpt: We're bringing the award-winning Squid Game: Unleashed game to your Chromebook and large screen Android devices like tablets and foldables.Developed by Boss Fight, Netflix Game Studio Squid Game: Unleashed is a 32-player party royale showdown featuring challenges, characters, settings and iconography fans will instantly recognize from the hit series.You’ll be able to experience immersive gameplay on a bigger screen, with keyboard and mouse support, updated control layouts and graphics that take full advantage of your device's display.The large screen optimized version of “Squid Game: Unleashed” will be available for Chromebooks and Android tablets and in the coming weeks.
text: We're bringing the award-winning Squid Game: Unleashed game to your Chromebook and large screen Android devices like tablets and foldables.Developed by Boss Fight, Netflix Game Studio Squid Game: Unleashed is a 32-player party royale showdown featuring challenges, characters, settings and iconography fans will instantly recognize from the hit series.You’ll be able to experience immersive gameplay on a bigger screen, with keyboard and mouse support, updated control layouts and graphics that take full advantage of your device's display.The large screen optimized version of “Squid Game: Unleashed” will be available for Chromebooks and Android tablets and in the coming weeks.
html:
We're bringing the award-winning Squid Game: Unleashed game to your Chromebook and large screen Android devices like tablets and foldables.

Developed by Boss Fight, Netflix Game Studio Squid Game: Unleashed is a 32-player party royale showdown featuring challenges, characters, settings and iconography fans will instantly recognize from the hit series.

You’ll be able to experience immersive gameplay on a bigger screen, with keyboard and mouse support, updated control layouts and graphics that take full advantage of your device's display.

The large screen optimized version of “Squid Game: Unleashed” will be available for Chromebooks and Android tablets and in the coming weeks.
